short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We help you understand Terms of Service documents!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: T.O.S Lens is a browser extension designed to simplify and summarize complex Terms of Service (TOS) agreements. By scanning a website, the extension extracts TOS content and uses AI to generate concise, actionable insights about key clauses such as data collection, tracking, and third-party sharing practices. The goal is to promote transparency, empower users with quick understanding, and help them make informed decisions without navigating lengthy legal jargon. It emphasizes user protection and clarity in the digital space.
